Dear Devanshi, 

I hope you're doing well. 

My name is Tanush Changani, and I am a senior studying computer and data engineering at City University of Hong Kong. I'm inquiring about your availability for a quick call or coffee in the coming weeks to hear about your experience as a Software Engineer at Google, especially working on GCP Pub/Sub. 

As someone undecided about where to start a career in software engineering, advice from someone with so much experience would be amazing. I'd love to learn from someone who has been working at the intersection of Machine Learning and Software Engineering. 

I have attached my resume for you to look over, and I would gladly work around your schedule to find a time that fits. I look forward to hearing from you and hope you have a great week! 

Sincerely, 
Tanush Changani
